name: Sweet Potato Canapes with BBQ Mung Bean Sprouts
description: These Sweet Potato Canapes are very addictive, topped with Mung Bean Sprouts tossed in BBQ sauce.
recipeIngredient: 2 teaspoons vegan Worcestershire sauce (or use 1/4 teaspoon tamarind paste and 1 teaspoon soy sauce. Use coconut aminos for Soy-free)
1/4 teaspoon each of mustard (garlic powder, ginger powder, onion powder)
a generous dash of cumin powder (black pepper and cayenne)
Add a tablespoon of cornstarch or arrowroot starch if you want the sauce to thicken considerably when heated.
Add a Tablespoon ground raw sugar if you like it sweeter.
2-3  Yams or Sweet Potatoes peeled and sliced

itemListElement.text: Mix all the ingredients. Taste and adjust and add salt, spices more or less.
itemListElement.name: Mix all the ingredients. Taste and adjust and add salt, spices more or less.

itemListElement.text: Add cornstarch and mix well and refrigerate.
itemListElement.name: Add cornstarch and mix well and refrigerate.

itemListElement.text: The taste will get deeper after everything sits for a while. The sauces and spices can be readjusted.
itemListElement.name: The taste will get deeper after everything sits for a while. The sauces and spices can be readjusted.

itemListElement.text: Sprout the Mung beans. Here is a handy sprouting guide. The pictures ones have been sprouting for 2.5 days. I soak them overnight, then drain, rinse and place in a bowl covered with wet towel and a lid. Drin, rinse every 6-8 hours.
itemListElement.name: Sprout the Mung beans. Here is a handy sprouting guide. The pictures ones have been sprouting for 2.5 days. I soak them overnight, then drain, rinse and place in a bowl covered with wet towel and a lid. Drin, rinse every 6-8 hours.

itemListElement.text: Wash the sprouts and mix favorite barbecue sauce and keep ready.
itemListElement.name: Wash the sprouts and mix favorite barbecue sauce and keep ready.

itemListElement.text: Add 2-3 Tablespoons sauce for every cup of sprouts.
itemListElement.name: Add 2-3 Tablespoons sauce for every cup of sprouts.

itemListElement.text: Wash, peel and slice Sweet potatoes.
itemListElement.name: Wash, peel and slice Sweet potatoes.

itemListElement.text: Brush both side with olive oil and roast at 400 degrees F / 200ºc for 18-20 minutes, depends on the thickness of the slice.
itemListElement.name: Brush both side with olive oil and roast at 400 degrees F / 200ºc for 18-20 minutes, depends on the thickness of the slice.

itemListElement.text: Remove the baking tray and top the sweet potato slices with a good amount of saucy Sprouts.
itemListElement.name: Remove the baking tray and top the sweet potato slices with a good amount of saucy Sprouts.

itemListElement.text: Bake for another 2-3 minutes. This will set the sauce and the topping will not slide around.
itemListElement.name: Bake for another 2-3 minutes. This will set the sauce and the topping will not slide around.

itemListElement.text: Top with chopped red onion and cilantro.
itemListElement.name: Top with chopped red onion and cilantro.

itemListElement.text: Eat/Serve. Try to keep some for the guests.
itemListElement.name: Eat/Serve. Try to keep some for the guests.
